backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing sessions, events, captions, and scoreboard state with functions to start, update, and end broadcasts.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping UI fixes and scoreboard-related updates to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file for routing, hooks, components, and broadcast UI.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode tokens, and shared utility styling.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring TanStack Router with routes for broadcaster and viewer pages inside a shared layout.
frontend/src/components/broadcast/Broadc: Mic toggle button component handling mic enabled state, errors, retry, and loading UI.
frontend/src/components/broadcast/Footba: Broadcast control panel providing a flag event dialog tied to scoreboard state and flag submission mutations.
frontend/src/components/broadcast/Microp: Helper component displaying microphone permission or device errors with retry support.
frontend/src/components/broadcast/Permis: UI component showing camera permission or hardware errors with a retry action.
frontend/src/components/broadcast/Scoreb: UI for adjusting team scores and roles, sending updates via mutation. Provides increment/decrement controls and offense/defense toggles.
frontend/src/components/broadcast/Sessio: Displays the session code and provides a copy-to-clipboard button with visual feedback.
frontend/src/components/events/EventFeed: Shows a scrollable list of game events with icons and timestamps. Uses ScoreboardShell for layout.
frontend/src/components/events/FlagAnnou: Renders a styled overlay announcing a flag event on either left or right side of the screen.
frontend/src/components/events/LatestEve: Displays a temporary top-center overlay highlighting the most recent event for five seconds.
frontend/src/components/layout/FootballL: App layout with header, footer, social links, and theming for the Gridiron Live interface.
frontend/src/components/scoreboard/OnCam: Bottom overlay showing team icons, names, scores, and offense arrows for on-camera broadcasts.
frontend/src/components/scoreboard/Score: Template card wrapper providing consistent title and styling for scoreboard-related sections.
frontend/src/components/system/Unsupport: Displays a warning card when the user's browser lacks required broadcasting features.
frontend/src/components/viewer/ViewerSub: Shows captions or a warning when captions are unavailable, positioned at the top center.
frontend/src/components/viewer/ViewerVid: Video player for viewers handling live, waiting, ended, and error states with overlays and retry logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBroadcasterSession: Manages broadcaster session lifecycle, generating session codes and calling mutations to start or end sessions and set team icons.
frontend/src/hooks/useBroadcastMediaStre: Builds a combined broadcast MediaStream from video and optional microphone audio, with logic to toggle and manage audio tracks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity restoration, and exposing identity state and helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useMicrophone.ts: Controls microphone access with support checks, start/stop logic, error handling, and exposes audio stream and track.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend actor queries and mutations for session data, events, scoreboard updates, and related invalidation logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionCode.ts: Stores and retrieves the session code in localStorage with helper setters and clear functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionLifecycle.t: Derives a session state ('waiting', 'live', or 'ended') from metadata and loading status.
Implements speech‑to‑text using browser SpeechRecognition, managing listening state, transcript, and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useTimedFlagOverlay.t: React hook that shows the latest unseen flag event for a timed duration and tracks seen flags in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useViewerLiveStream.t: Manages viewer-side WebRTC setup for receiving a live stream, handling connection state, errors, and retries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom theme variables, field background, and utility classes for scoreboard UI.
frontend/src/lib/teamIcons.ts: Defines team icon metadata and helpers for retrieving icon info and scoreboard names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/BroadcasterPage.tsx: Main broadcaster interface handling camera/mic setup, session control, events, scoreboard, and overlays.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page offering navigation to broadcast or watch modes.
frontend/src/pages/ViewerJoinPage.tsx: Page for entering and validating a session code before navigating to the viewer stream.
frontend/src/pages/ViewerWatchPage.tsx: Viewer page that loads session data, video, events, scoreboard, captions, and overlays, with UI for leaving the session and toggling subtitles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, color tokens, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON snapshot describing project state, architecture notes, known issues, and feature records for a football‑themed live streaming app.
